name: Michelle Zhang
title: Undergraduate at Stanford University
summary: I'm an undergraduate student at Stanford with an interest in software engineering and applied mathematics. I'm always looking for opportunities to apply my skills to gain new experiences and work on challenging projects that have a real-world impact.
